hero.title: Experience Authentic Japanese Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Discover the art of sushi making with our master chefs. Fresh ingredients, traditional techniques, and modern presentation.

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The best sushi I've ever had! The Dragon Roll was absolutely incredible. Fresh ingredients and amazing presentation.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: Authentic Japanese flavors with a modern twist. The Bento Box is perfect for lunch, and the service is exceptional.

items.name: Emma Rodriguez
items.content: The Ramen Bowl is absolutely divine! Rich broth, perfect noodles, and the atmosphere is so cozy and welcoming.
